title: Behind The Idea # 16: Aswath Damodaran Talks Facebook, Valuation, And Stories
description:
Professor Aswath Damodaran joins Behind the Idea this week to discuss Facebook as a follow-up to our episode reviewing his article (BTI #12). He also sheds light on his investing philosophy, why he dislikes the Dean of Valuation moniker, and the importance of faith and testing your faith in investing. 
Topics covered: Why the 'Dean of Valuation' is a terrifying title - 1:10 minute mark
Recapping Damodaran's Facebook (FB) thesis - 2:00
How do you deal with the risk to Facebook's dominance? - 3:45
The piece W
